entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Simplifier.AddImportsAnnotation` does not work with Attributes #67237

Closed

  • 50x slower build with .net 6.0.403 compared to 6.0.402 #66475
    17.6
  • SyntaxContext can't infer FunctionPointer type #50764
    Backlog
  • CA1044 (Properties should not be write only) False Positive #67235
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.ImageCatalog is blocking moving to net5.0 #50893
    Backlog
  • IDE0044 (Add readonly modifier) false positive #47197
  • IDE0057 drops `checked` and `unchecked` modifiers for range simplification #60988
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • [DO NOT MERGE] #67239
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make the import of IPasteTrackingService optional #67238
    Area-IDE
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Run analyzers only for requested span #67236
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix PatternMatcher caching in CompletionHelper #67232
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix error location in test #67234
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Infra fixes #67223
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Support generating methods when used in function pointer contexts #67230
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 'make field readonly' to understand a special strict behaviour around generic assignment. #67227
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update tests to use raw strings. #67231
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issue with 'use range operator' #67200
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove 'ID' argument from WorkItem. (IDE only) #67210
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Enforce proper shadowing for locals and parameters in EE #67189
    Area-Compilers
  • Warn when taking address of local or parameter in async method #66915
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Interactive-EnC
  • Keep runtime version in sync with VS #67164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add 'name' to option group #67136
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #67082
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Primary Constructors - Don't report unused parameters #67167
    Area-IDE
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow 'convert to interpolated string' to work in any API, instead of just a whitelisted set. #67135
    Area-IDE
  • Have AsyncLazy always cache values #67207
    Area-IDE
  • Fix failure to expose IsExternalInit in net6.0 binaries #67171
    Area-Compilers
